overview: Black-listed Professor Fued believes he has found a cure for acute schizophrenia by implanting living parasites into his patients' brains. When son Jeff witnesses his father at work he is appalled. He and apparently-normal patient Molly, whom he loves, are next on the treatment schedule...
tagline: A super brain-scanning, brain-draining, brain-smashing membrane of a movie!
title: Brain Fix
